tool_description: Designs combustion chamber geometry based on propellant properties, thrust requirements, and thermal constraints, optimizing for performance and manufacturability.

target_thrust.description: Desired thrust level in Newtons (100 to 10000000)

chamber_pressure.description: Operating chamber pressure in bar (1.0 to 300.0)

specific_impulse.description: Propellant specific impulse in seconds (200 to 500)

characteristic_velocity.description: Propellant characteristic velocity in m/s (1000 to 3000)

contraction_ratio.description: Chamber to throat area ratio (1.5 to 20.0)

length_diameter_ratio.description: Chamber length to diameter ratio (0.5 to 5.0)

wall_material.description: Chamber wall material: steel, inconel, copper, carbon_composite

cooling_method.description: Cooling approach: regenerative, radiative, ablative, dump

error_messages: Thrust level out of range: Target thrust must be between 100 and 10,000,000 Newtons
Chamber pressure out of range: Value must be between 1.0 and 300.0 bar
Specific impulse out of range: Value must be between 200 and 500 seconds
Characteristic velocity out of range: Value must be between 1000 and 3000 m/s
Contraction ratio out of range: Value must be between 1.5 and 20.0
Length-diameter ratio out of range: Value must be between 0.5 and 5.0
Invalid wall material: Must be one of [steel, inconel, copper, carbon_composite]
Invalid cooling method: Must be one of [regenerative, radiative, ablative, dump]
usage: Provide target_thrust, chamber_pressure, specific_impulse, and characteristic_velocity from propellant analysis. Optionally specify geometric ratios, wall_material, and cooling_method. The tool outputs optimized chamber dimensions and specifications.

chamber_volume.description: Chamber internal volume in cubic meters

mass_flow_rate.description: Total propellant mass flow rate in kg/s

wall_thickness.description: Recommended minimum wall thickness in meters
